content.html: Learn to state your own boundaries on Twitter and accept others'. Boundaries are cool. Mine? Don't joke about my body (even compliments!) if I didn't mention it in the Tweet first/it's not a selfie, and avoid joking about Robert/my relationship if the Tweet is totally unrelated.
content.value:
Learn to state your own boundaries on Twitter and accept others'. Boundaries are cool.

Mine? Don't joke about my body (even compliments!) if I didn't mention it in the Tweet first/it's not a selfie, and avoid joking about Robert/my relationship if the Tweet is totally unrelated.

photo.alt: A random user commenting "BigGlassesBiggerBoobs is open FYI" in response to me talking about making a cooking tiktok. I reply, "Hey, politely, I don't know you enough first to make jokes about my body when I didn't make them in the tweet first!" They reply with, "... ok."
